column1: The Purple Pig////Crispy Pig's Ear ($19): If you're grossed out by ears
column2: it's okay. it's cut into small strips and fried
column3: so you wouldn't even know what it's made of. basically tastes like anything else that's been fried. pretty good
column4: but also too salty. I like the idea of the fried kale and pickled banana peppers
column5: but the saltiness just wasn't doing it for me. This was way too expensive to be worth it.
